1423800.name: Welcome to Elk - Soundtrack
1423800.description:
Original soundtrack for Welcome to Elk, the music that accompanies the game's true stories of funny drinking anecdotes and tragic tales of misfortune.

The sprawling 39 track score is composed by Andreas Busk and Troels Nygaard and is their love letter to the island, its people and stories.

With every track from the game included, you can relive Frigg's journey to Elk and the stories she shares with all of its inhabitants; their rituals of joyful community, uneasy banter and quiet moments of grief.
